channel.title: IoT Talks
channel.description: Its a collection of technical talks that I enjoyed watching. I have avoided putting product announcements or company specific talks.You can also contribute to the list by forking on github.

item.title: Harvard i-lab | The Business of the Internet of Things (Chad Jones)
item.description: Good insight on the IOT and the business opportunity around

item.title: TEDxCIT | The Internet of Things (Dr. John Barrett)
item.description: Great talk explaining the Internet Of Things and how it affects our lives
